Dear Matbia User:
As a giver, it's your season! For us at Matbia, it’s the season to once again improve your experience. Effortless giving is nothing new; favoring your Matbia card for all your charity attests to that.
We now introduce our Matbia vouchers for this year Purim; it’s another way of donating easily this Purim, and all tracked and reported in your Matbia portal.
The vouchers are prepaid in amounts you can choose to fit your specific needs.
• Skip the long lines in the bank to withdraw cash
• In the Purim frenzy, every dollar you give will be accounted for and your taxes and Maaser calculations accurate.
• We provide free shipping to your doorstep.
The vouchers can be ordered through your Matbia portal.
The deadline to order your vouchers in time for Purim is
Wednesday, March 1st at 12 PM
Thank you for giving with Matbia.
We value the opportunity to make you a more seasoned giver.
